skill.s1.name: Echoing Tide
skill.s1.description: Gain 1 stack of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color] and deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, with a [color=#00adff][b]50%[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#00adff][b][i]Freeze[/i][/b][/color] and decreases their [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (For every [color=#00adff][b]5.47% EHR[/b][/color], additionally decreases [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 3 turns.

If the target is inflicted with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color], dispels their [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] then inflicts all enemies with [color=#afd7ef][b][Fading Flame][/b][/color] ([color=#afd7ef][b][Fading Flame][/b][/color] cannot trigger this effect).

[color=#afd7ef][b][Fading Flame][/b][/color]: Increases all Thieves's [color=#ff3b1d][b]TECHNICAL[/b][/color] Mastery by [color=#ff3b1d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] when attacking enemies with this effect, this effect is considered as [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color] and lasts for 3 turns.
skill.s2.name: Binding Wave
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.
Deals [color=#00adff][b]Ice TECHNICAL[/b][/color], then increases the base chance when triggering [color=#80a6ab][b][Ice Seal][/b][/color] to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]
skill.s3.name: Bursting Waterfall
skill.s3.description: [b]Unlocks when Matoi has 2 stacks of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color].[/b]

Consumes 2 stacks of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color], deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies and decreases their [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (For every [color=#00adff][b]5.83% EHR[/b][/color], additionally decreases [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 2 turns.
Deals [color=#00adff][b]Ice TECHNICAL[/b][/color], and when triggering [color=#4b98c5][b][Ice Burn][/b][/color], upgrades to [color=#78c5e5][b][Cold Shine][/b][/color].

[color=#78c5e5][b][Cold Shine][/b][/color]: Increase all enemies' [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (For every [color=#00adff][b]4.38% EHR[/b][/color], additionally increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]).
When Matoi has 4 stacks of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color], upgrade this skill to [ref=s3][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Bursting Waterfall·Tornado][/u][/b][/color][/ref].

Consumes 4 stacks of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color], deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies and decreases their [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (For every [color=#00adff][b]4.86% EHR[/b][/color], additionally decreases [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 2 turns.
Deals [color=#00adff][b]Ice TECHNICAL[/b][/color], and when triggering [color=#4b98c5][b][Ice Burn][/b][/color], upgrades to [color=#78c5e5][b][Cold Shine][/b][/color].

[color=#78c5e5][b][Cold Shine][/b][/color]: Increase all [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] (For every [color=#00adff][b]3.65% EHR[/b][/color], additionally increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG Taken[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]).
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies and increases their [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken (For every [color=#00adff][b]5.83% EHR[/b][/color], increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color], up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 2 turns.

Deals [color=#00adff][b]Ice TECHNICAL[/b][/color], then increases the base chance when triggering [color=#80a6ab][b][Ice Seal][/b][/color] to [color=#00adff][b]28%[/b][/color], enemies with [color=#80a6ab][b][Ice Seal][/b][/color] additionally increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken (For every [color=#00adff][b]17.5%[/b][/color], additionally increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color] up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]).
Then deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.
skill.p1.name: Shelter
skill.p1.description: When Matoi deals [color=#00adff][b]TECHNICAL[/b][/color], give all Thieves 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} Shield[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p2.name: Pressure
skill.p2.description: When Matoi is present, enemies with [color=#00adff][b][i]Freeze[/i][/b][/color] increase [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Fire Containment
awareness.a0.description: At the start of Matoi's turn, gain 1 stack of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color], up to 4 stacks.
Each stack of [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color] consumed will inflict all enemies with 1 stack of [color=#62dbeb][b][Drowning][/b][/color].
[color=#62dbeb][b][Drowning][/b][/color]: Increases [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]6%[/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.
awareness.a1.name: Firefighting Unit
awareness.a1.description: Additionally gains 1 [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color] when using [ref=s1][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Echoing Tide][/u][/b][/color][/ref].
Increases all enemies' [color=#00adff][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color] when consuming [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a2.name: Border Guardian
awareness.a2.description: When consuming [color=#4b81cb][b][Extinguishing Power][/b][/color], increases all Thieves' [color=#00adff][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]20%[/b][/color], [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color], and [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#00adff][b]15%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a3.name: Cut Off the Smoke
awareness.a3.description: [ref=s3][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Bursting Waterfall][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: Calm the Flame
awareness.a4.description: [ref=hl][color=#68a0c8][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Extends the [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken duration from [ref=hl][color=#68a0c8][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 1 turn.

Increases the base chance of [color=#80a6ab][b][Ice Seal][/b][/color] to [color=#00adff][b]40%[/b][/color] when [ref=hl][color=#68a0c8][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] triggers [color=#80a6ab][b][Ice Seal][/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Seven Principles
awareness.a5.description: [ref=s1][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Echoing Tide][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s2][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Binding Wave][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a6.name: Flower of Edo
awareness.a6.description: At the start of Matoi's turn, if any enemy is inflicted with [color=#ff3b1d][b][i]Burn[/i][/b][/color], immediately use [ref=s1][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Echoing Tide][/u][/b][/color][/ref] with them as the main target ([color=#afd7ef][b][Fading Flame][/b][/color] cannot trigger this effect).

When using [ref=s3][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Bursting Waterfall][/u][/b][/color][/ref]/[ref=s3][color=#68a0c8][b][u][Bursting Waterfall·Tornado][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on the same target, additionally increases the target's [color=#00adff][b]DMG[/b][/color] Taken by [color=#00adff][b]25%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
